column4: I'm booting a virtualbox VM running 11.04. It recognizes the virtual ethernet card and loads the e1000 module, but doesn't create the eth0 interface. Any ideas why, or what I can do?
saw a similer oddity the other day in vbox. idid nit see the eth0, but when i did s dhclient eth0 it came up. not sure why.
in my case it was going to eth1
